ideas.text: #IamIT -- Let's have monthly knowledge shares on Excel!
I think we should have templates and standards for web and mobile app development. #OperationalExcellence
#EverydayAnalytics We need a DIY authentication solution for homegrown dashboard developers.
Use LinkedIn Learning for basic instruction in statistics -- for everyone. #EverydayAnalytics
Need a better budgeting process with meaningful approvals. #FinancialLiteracy
We should have a budget for #CloudSecOps and agreed upon methods of internal charge backs.
#IntelligentChat -- I think that we need more languages in chat. Our newest big accounts are in Brazil, and Portuguese is spiking, 10% of revenue overall.
#5by25 Italian market is ripe for new investment and our brand is hot there. Double our footprint! üëç
Please separate the meat in cafeteria recipes. We can add meat to entrees or go vegetarian with no extra entree needed. #GreenCampus
We need authentication for new apps built in house just like we have on Google cloud. #CloudSecOps
